actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1652 of title 38, United States Code, to make 1977 graduates of the service academies eligible for educational assistance under the GI bill.

summary.text: Makes eligible for veterans' educational assistance any person who served before January 1, 1977, as a cadet or midshipman at one of the service academies, and as a result of such service served on active duty for more than 180 days, any part of which commenced within 12 months after January 1, 1977, and was discharged or released under conditions other than dishonorable.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1652 of title 38, United States Code, to make 1977 graduates of the service academies eligible for educational assistance under the GI bill.
